name: A Baby Horse Run - Jumping Horses Race Games
name_original: A Baby Horse Run - Jumping Horses Race Games
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** EASY TO PLAY! HOURS OF FUN! **

Get ready for a fun filled horse run game where you get to pick one of three horses to run and jump your way around an obstacle filled world. How far can you go? Give it a try and find out!

FEATURES

- All horses unlocked.
- Cute graphics.
- Fun sounds.
- Easy game play.
